title: The Exchange: The failure and future of globalism
description:
Not everyone has been a winner from globalization. Eurasia Group founder Ian Bremmer talked to Amanda Gomez about his book “Us vs. Them: The Failure of Globalism” and discussed what political and business leaders can do to make the world economic system work for all.   See acast.com/privacy for privacy and opt-out information.
